entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
